join.help: Makes the bot join your voice channel. You need to be in a voice channel.
join.brief: Makes the bot join your voice channel.

leave.help: Makes the bot disconnect from its voice channel.
leave.brief: Makes the bot leave its voice channel.

play.help: Make the bot play the given song. If the bot is not connected to a voice channel, it will try to connect on yours before playing. If a song is being played, it will put the given song on a queue to be played latter.
play.brief: Make the bot play the given song.

pause.help: Pauses the current song if any is being played.

resume.help: Pauses the current song if the current song is paused.
